Class Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • support.Vector

  • public class Vector
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Vector. Represent the vector carrier as the geometrical element.
    Author:
    Richiard Casadei, Marco Zaccheroni

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        sum Inner product

      • magnitude

        public double magnitude()
        Method magnitude. It returns the Euclidean norm of a vector. So it assigns to a vector of a vectorial space, except the zero, a positive length.
        Returns:
        norm The vector length

      • distanceTo

        public double distanceTo(Vector that)
        Method magnitude. It returns the Euclidean distance between two vectors.
        Returns:
        dist The distance

      • plus

        public Vector plus(Vector that)
        Method plus. It calculate and returns an object Vector who represent the sum of the vector and the vector passed as parameter.
        Returns:
        c The Vector sum

      • minus

        public Vector minus(Vector that)
        Method minus. It calculate and returns an object Vector who represent the removal of the vector and the vector passed as parameter.
        Returns:
        c The Vector difference

      • cartesian

        public double cartesian(int i)
        Method cartesian. Passing an integer as parameter it returns the corresponding coordinate of a vector.
        Parameters:
        i - Integer value corresponding the index of the vector in the array.
        Returns:
        data[i] The Vector difference

      • times

        public Vector times(double factor)
        Method times. It returns a new Vector object whose value is (vector * factor).
        Parameters:
        factor - Double number
        Returns:
        data[i] The Vector difference

      • direction

        public Vector direction()
        Method direction. It returns the direction of a vector corresponding to the unit vector.
        Returns:
        dir The direction
